pkgmetadata.longdescription: Variable Selection for Generalized Linear Mixed Models by L1-Penalized Estimation // A variable selection approach for generalized linear mixed models by L1-penalized estimation is provided, see Groll and Tutz (2014) doi:10.1007/s11222-012-9359-z. See also Groll and Tutz (2017) doi:10.1007/s10985-016-9359-y for discrete survival models including heterogeneity.
